Under the Compact of Free Association, visa exemption applies to:
citizens by birth
former citizens of the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands who were citizens in 1986
naturalized spouses, children and naturalized citizens who are residents for at least 5 years, and does not apply to those who obtained passports through passport sale.
